planet.name: KOI-0775 b
KOI-0775 01
planet.description: This is a Kepler Object of Interest from the Q1-Q8 dataset. It has been flagged as a confirmed planet by the Kepler team and might have already appear in a peer reviewed paper.

KOI-0775 03
planet.description: This is a Kepler Object of Interest from the Q1-Q8 dataset. It has been flagged as a possible transit event but has not been confirmed to be a planet yet.
